title: Israel-Palestinian conflict marks its deadliest day as scenes of horror unfold in Gaza | 7NEWS
author: 7NEWS Australia
description:
Israel bombed the house of Hamas’ Gaza leader and obliterated a family’s home in Gaza as Hamas launched more than 100 rockets towards Israel on Sunday, marking the deadliest day of the week-long conflict so far. Subscribe to 7NEWS for the latest video » https://7news.link/YTSubscribe

localize.description:

localize.title: 以色列-巴勒斯坦冲突进入最致命的一天，加沙地区出现了恐怖的场面 | 7NEWS

localize.description:
